title: Putin’s Top Security Official Visits Iran as Russia Seeks Precision Weapons
description: The visit comes as Western and Ukrainian officials warn that Russia is trying to secure high-tech Iranian missiles and drones to deploy on the battlefield.
dc:creator: Anatoly Kurmanaev and Marc Santora
media:credit: Brendan Hoffman for The New York Times
media:description: People protesting outside Iran’s Embassy in Kyiv, the Ukrainian capital, after Russia used Iranian-supplied explosive drones to attack the center of the city last month.
